attributes.action: Demand that the proposed 2012 Olympic logo is changed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognising that the 2012 Olympic logo is an outdated and ineffective attempt at representing London in its Olympic bid we want to see it replaced by something which truly represents London and the rest of the UK and will remain iconic for many years to come.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
